title: Corrigendum to “Experimental Determination of Solubilities of Di-calcium Ethylenediaminetetraacetic Acid Hydrate [Ca2C10H12N2O8•7H2O(s)] in NaCl and MgCl2 Solutions to High Ionic Strengths and Its Pitzer Model: Applications to Geological Disposal of Nuclear Waste and Other Low Temperature Environments” [CHEMGE: 454, 5 April 2017; Pages 15-24]
